creditline: Gift of Jack A. and Aviva Robinson
description: Printed cloth band, Pieced, printed lining. Soft multi colors, red ground. Chain stitches large center medallion in vertical rectangle with three borders. Applied print edge. Embroidered on thre vertical panels. Red ikat print lining. Two adjacent velcro heading bands. Pieced lining.
medium: Silk, cotton; hook chain stitch, checkered chain stitch
title: Suzani
